arts.ttl: Frank Schmidt: “We’re not good enough to win Bundesliga games”
arts.sum: Heidenheim’s coach showed frustration after his side’s 16th defeat of the league season. FCH only lost 12 during their debut Bundesliga season.

arts.ttl: Mainz and Burkardt shine against struggling Heidenheim
arts.sum: Mainz players celebrate Jonathan Burkardt's (l.) crucial opening goal against Heidenheim - IMAGO/Steven Mohr Mathias Honsak came close for Heidenheim in the 25th minute, but his effort was well saved by Robin Zentner in the Mainz goal.

arts.ttl: Mainz comfortably beat relegation threatened Heidenheim
arts.sum: Mainz needed only two goals to comfortably see out a vital victory away on Sunday against relegation threatened Heidenheim after the home side's European thriller on Thursday.

Mainz boast the league's joint-second best defensive record, behind Bayern, but have lost three of their last five to stagnate in seventh spot. After losing six in a row, Heidenheim remain in the rel...

arts.ttl: Heidenheim vs. Mainz 05 preview: Hosts out to end losing run
arts.sum: Heidenheim will look to end a run of four consecutive defeats when they welcome Mainz 05 to the Voith-Arena on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Heidenheim vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Heidenheim and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
